sufian.video.stream

Class Streamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sufian.video.stream.Streamer

  • public class Streamer
extends Object
    A class for streaming the video output data captured from camera.
    Author:
    Sufian Latif

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean DEBUG
      Set this to true to get Log messages from this class.
      private String destIP
      IP address of receiver.
      private int destPort
      Receiver's port number.
      private VideoPacketizer pack
      Packetizer object - instantiated according to video encoder.
      private RecordingParameters params
      Necessary parameters for Recorder.
      private String TAG 
      private Recorder videoRecorder
      Extended MediaRecorder for recording video.

      Prepares the Recorder to start recording.
      void startStreaming()
      Starts recording and packetization.

        Creates a Streamer object.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • prepareRecorder

        public void prepareRecorder(SurfaceHolder sh)
        Prepares the Recorder to start recording. Also instantiates the VideoPacketizer depending on the encoder.
        Parameters:
        sh - The SurfaceHolder for displaying preview.

      • startStreaming

        public void startStreaming()
        Starts recording and packetization.

      • stopStreaming

        public void stopStreaming()
        Stops recording and packetization, releases resources.
